title: Olivia Attwood shows off the results of her £2,500 new jawline and chin
text:
Olivia Attwood has revealed the results of her £2,500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure on @skindoctorclinics Instagram page.

The 28-year-old former Love Island star was thrilled with the work she had done as she wrote in the comments section: 'The bestttttttt and a heart shaped emoji.'

Dr Saleena Zimri, who conducted the procedure at the Leeds branch of Skin Doctor Clinics, wrote alongside the before and after snaps: 'I mean wow.'

Before and after: Olivia Attwood showed off the results of her £2500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure on Instagram on Thursday as she called her cosmetic surgeon 'the best'

'Before and after liposuction to the submental region (under the chin) and contour with filler for the beautiful @oliviajade_attwood.

'Olivia is naturally super slim but had a little stubborn fat (likely genetics) under the chin region.

'We emptied the pocket and tightened the skin. Together with some fine definition work with filler.'

Dr Saleena Zimri said: 'Olivia is naturally super slim but had a little stubborn fat (likely genetics) under the chin region'

She continued: 'Also note the differences in the upper lip profile in the second picture. Both pictures a few months apart.

'All done under local anaesthesia only. No sedation. One incision point. Minimal downtime. Body Jet Lipo contouring (done in Leeds) from £2500.'

Back in June, Olivia revealed she was proud of her 'banging' new breasts after undergoing a breast reduction surgery.

Changing: Back in June, Olivia revealed she was proud of her 'banging' new breasts after undergoing a reduction surgery

She had said her body was aching from the weight of her old 10 year old implants.

Speaking to heat after the procedure, she said: 'I had a downsize – old ones out, new ones in, because I’d had those implants since I was 19.

'They were really heavy and too big for my body, so I was starting to get some really bad aching.

'I can’t wait to be able to wear more clothes now without my boobs falling out, putting people off their dinner.'
description: Olivia Attwood has revealed the results of her £2500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure on  @skindoctorclinics Instagram page.
